SDG_TARGET:
5.c

Adopt and strengthen sound policies and enforceable legislation for the promotion of gender equality and the empowerment of all women and girls at all levels
SDG_INDICATOR:
5.c.1

Proportion of countries with systems to track and make public allocations for gender equality and women’s empowerment
STAT_CONC_DEF:
Indicator available

Organic Budget Law No. 12/2013, Instituting Gender Responsive Budgeting, Enforces accountability measures for gender sensitive resource allocation across sectors programmes and projects through Gender Budget Statements; a mandatory annex of the Budget Framework Paper submitted to both chambers of Parliament.
